mapper.select: select dii.id,dii.designation,dii.picture,group_concat(dt.`name`) as typename from data_institution_info dii LEFT JOIN data_institution_type_relation ditr on dii.id=ditr.institution_id LEFT JOIN data_type dt on ditr.data_type=dt.id GROUP BY dii.id,dii.designation,dii.picture
